name: ToL-Mod-Utility
description: Moderation utility for Throne of Lies player reports.

scripts.build-x64: electron-packager . ToL-Mod-Utility --platform win32 --arch x64 --asar=true --out dist/ --overwrite --prune  --icon=./src/icon.ico --app-bundle-id=robflop --helper-bundle-id=robflop --version-string.CompanyName="robflop" --version-string.ProductName=ToL-Mod-Utility --version-string.FileDescription=ToL-Mod-Utility --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright (C) 2017 robflop" --version-string.InternalName=robflop --version-string.OriginalFilename=ToL-Mod-Utility.exe
scripts.build-ia32: electron-packager . ToL-Mod-Utility --platform win32 --arch ia32 --asar=true --out dist/ --overwrite --prune  --icon=./src/icon.ico --app-bundle-id=robflop --helper-bundle-id=robflop --version-string.CompanyName="robflop" --version-string.ProductName=ToL-Mod-Utility --version-string.FileDescription=ToL-Mod-Utility --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright (C) 2017 robflop" --version-string.InternalName=robflop --version-string.OriginalFilename=ToL-Mod-Utility.exe
scripts.build-win: npm run build-x64 && npm run build-ia32

author: robflop
